item.title: Charts indicate further downside is ahead for Tesla, auto stocks just as tariff threat emerges
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts on Tesla and other automakers.

item.title: Trump coin leads tumble in meme cryptocurrencies as tariffs rock global markets
item.description: Meme coins plummeted over the weekend as President Donald Trump signed new tariffs, kicking off a trade war that caused investors to dump risk assets.

item.title: Vanguard announces fee cuts for nearly 100 funds, including ETFs with billions of dollars in assets
item.description: The asset manager said this is its biggest fee cut ever and will save investors about $350 million this year.

item.title: Morgan Stanley downgrades U.S. Steel, sees limited growth opportunities ahead
item.description: Shares have pulled back 20% over the past year.

item.title: Paul Tudor Jones says markets are on shakier ground than in Trump's first term, leaving no room for error
item.description: "There's so many things that are cross currents ... this is a completely, totally different landscape than Trump 1.0," Jones said.
